viewable_record_materias.name: Attunement II
viewable_record_materias.cond_description: Chance to obtain with the Keeper in your party.
viewable_record_materias.description: Deal more bonus damage when attacking with an enemy's elemental weakness.

viewable_record_materias.name: Attunement I
viewable_record_materias.cond_description: Awarded for breaking character level cap.
viewable_record_materias.description: Deal slightly more bonus damage when attacking with an enemy's elemental weakness.

viewable_record_materias.name: Magic Flame I
viewable_record_materias.cond_description: Awarded for breaking character level cap.
viewable_record_materias.description: Attack has a slight chance to deal light magic fire damage instead of physical damage.

viewable_record_materias.name: Mana Spring I
viewable_record_materias.cond_description: Awarded for breaking character level cap.
viewable_record_materias.description: Chance to restore 1 black magic ability use at the start of battle.

viewable_record_materias.name: Mana Spring II
viewable_record_materias.cond_description: Attain Target Score: Win the Hein battle in the Hein's Castle Elite dungeon without the Black Mage being KO'd.
viewable_record_materias.description: Restore 1 black magic ability use at the start of battle.

viewable_record_materias.name: Concentration II
viewable_record_materias.cond_description: Attain Target Score: Win the Beatrix battle in the Burmecia Elite dungeon without the White Mage being KO'd.
viewable_record_materias.description: Restore 1 white magic ability use at the start of battle.

viewable_record_materias.name: Concentration I
viewable_record_materias.cond_description: Awarded for breaking character level cap.
viewable_record_materias.description: Chance to restore 1 white magic ability use at the start of battle.

viewable_record_materias.name: Summoning Spring II

viewable_record_materias.description: Restore 1 summon use at the start of battle.

viewable_record_materias.name: Summoning Spring I
viewable_record_materias.cond_description: Awarded for breaking character level cap.
viewable_record_materias.description: Chance to restore 1 summon use at the start of battle.

viewable_record_materias.name: Blue Moon Barrage

viewable_record_materias.description: Slight chance to trigger Barrage when using Attack.

viewable_record_materias.name: Master Archer
viewable_record_materias.cond_description: Awarded for breaking character level cap.
viewable_record_materias.description: Deal slightly more damage when using bows.

viewable_record_materias.name: Zealot

viewable_record_materias.cond_description: Awarded for breaking character level cap.
viewable_record_materias.description:
Gain Shell when low on HP.
